svensk guide :
1. Ladda ner torrent program (BitLord, bitlord.com)
2.ladda ner torrent och öppna i BitLord
3.ladda ner DAEMON tools (daemon-tools.cc) och WinRar (winrar.com eller Google)
4 .ladda ner cracken som EHCanadian har lagt upp, ta någon .mds fil
5.när nedladdningen e klar så ska man göra så här : klicka på deamon tools och mounta CD1, när den frågar om CD mounta den också.
6. installation klar! :-)
7.mounta .mds filen från GCW
8. Enjoy!! :-)

Nub Crackers:

getting a .torrent working/downloading and installing it:

Install:

Torrent-
http://www.download-it-free.com/azureus/
- Once downloaded Start it up - 
- CLick the Torrent and Place it into the azureus program -
- Thats it, now its downloading the game just let it do its thing (May take a few seconds or minutes to get a downloading signal from seeders) -

Once Downloaded:

Daemon Tools:  
http://www.daemon-tools.cc/dtcc/announcements.php
- Download and install -
- Once Finished start it up -
- There should be a small little red box at the bottom right side of your computers desktop near the Clock -
- Right click the red box and go to  virtual Cd/DvD Rom -
- Go to one of the devices example: Device0: [F] No Media -
- Highlight the device go to mount image -
- Find the ISO and mount it (start with cd 1) then an auto run should come up)
- During its install it will ask you for cd 2, Go back to daemon tools and repeat what I just told but load the cd 2 .ISO in the same cd/dvd rom device. -
- Then click ok on the installer, if it does not work = Click browse on the installer and find the drive that you mounted the disc2.ISO in and click it and hit ok -

Crack -
http://mirror.sourcez.co.uk/dl.php?file=NeedForSpeedUnderground2v1.0NoCDFixedexeEng.rar 
Thanks goes to bugoff for finding it
 - Place the crack in your main directory of NFSU 2 and itll ask you to rewrite your other .exe Click yes -

- You have succesfully installed NFSU 2 -
